text.section:
In this section, "common ownership community" means:
A condominium organized under Title 11 of the Real Property Article;
A homeowners association organized under Title 11B of the Real Property Article; or
A cooperative housing corporation organized under Title 5, Subtitle 6B of the Corporations and Associations Article.

By ordinance, Prince George's County may impose and collect a fee for the provision of administrative hearing services for the resolution of disputes involving a common ownership community located in the county.

Prince George's County may specify in the ordinance:
Which remedies must be exhausted before administrative hearing services may be utilized; and
The process involved in the administrative hearing services.
